Creates and configures a BearerAuthenticationFilter bean.
BearerAuthenticationFilter - Class in com.example.webdisk.security
BearerAuthenticationFilter is a custom filter that processes HTTP requests to authorize users based on a preauthentication Bearer token provided in the Authorization header.
